name: Lunar Powder Fields
description:
A simple falling sand game set in space! There are 20 particles accessible to the player, and a few more that must be created. This was my submission to LOWREZJAM 2022. I hope you enjoy!

Controls:
Esc - Exit game
Tab - Particle menu
Space - Pause simulation
R - Reset simulation
I - Toggle inspect mode
Y - In-game credits
/ - Controls
Left Mouse Button - Place particle
Middle Mouse Button - Copy particle
Right Mouse Button - Delete particle

Credits:
Programming, Graphics, and Design - Kingtut 101
Music - cynicmusic (Alex Smith)
Made using LOVE2D!
